attributes.action: abolish ,al al slaughter and cosher slaughter  in the  UK
attributes.additional_details: This cruel and  Barbaric  ritual slaughter  must be abolished  in the  uk ,    I have  witnesed this first hand   and  no body will convinse me that it is  not cruel,  and  barbaric, this  practice is going on in the  uk where we are sopose to be animal  lovers and care about animal welfare.. what a  joke , yet they can turn a  blind eye  to this cruelty   is  absolutly disgusting  . yet the govement will turn a  blind eye to it  and  the  RSPCA  do to ,, shame  on you both ,
